name: MEC Cignal 75L Backpack - Men's
description:
A trekking pack for fully loaded backcountry adventures. Bring your whole closet and your whole kitchen, the padded hipbelt and aluminum frame provide support, while the mesh-covered harness is comfortable on your back. A clamshell zipper and floating lid allow quick access to the main compartment. And loads of stretchy pockets let you stash a rain shell or extra snacks in easy-to-grab places. For cold outings, there's room to bring your warmest layers. In summer, you can haul a week-long menu of backcountry dinners and desserts.Tough 450- and 200-denier polyester fabrics have a water-resistant PU coating.Light aluminum frame with mesh covered foam provides support and moisture management.Removable floating lid with spindrift collar lets you adjust the height of your pack.Clamshell zipper gives easy access to the main compartment.Adjustable shoulder straps let you customize the fit.Adjustable sternum strap takes tension off your shoulders.2 stretch mesh side pockets are sized to hold water bottles for easy access.1 stretch mesh front stash pocket is perfect for your emergency layer.Compression straps keep your pack volume small.Top zippered accessory pocket with internal security pocket and key clip.Tool loops and elastic bungee cords let you attach hiking poles.Webbing straps at the bottom attach a sleeping pad.Padded hip belt is 3D moulded for comfort, with a zippered stash pocket.Recco® reflector is detectable by ski patrols and search and rescue teams.Hydration sleeve compatible.Rain cover included.

        Sustainability
